--- DateTime: 2021/12/8 0:03
--- 叶子节点
---@class bt_ac_switchAnima : IAction
local bt_ac_switchAnima = SimpleClassUtil:class(IAction)

function bt_ac_switchAnima:initData(data)
    self._aniName = data.aniName
    self._isReset = data.isReset or false
    self._speed = data.speed or 1
end
---@param blackBoard BlackBoard_BattleBase
function bt_ac_switchAnima:doAction(blackBoard,contextManager)
    if self._aniName then
        local data = {uid = blackBoard._uid,aniName = self._aniName,isReset = self._isReset,speed =  self._speed}
        EventManager:Dispatch_battle(EventType.Event_Battle_Render_SwitchAni, data)
    end
    return Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
end

return bt_ac_switchAnima
